title_en: US and Europe Alliance Amidst Tensions
summary_en: US Secretary of State Rubio has reassured European leaders that the Trump administration supports the transatlantic alliance, despite recent tensions. His comments aim to stabilize relations, emphasizing the shared values and strategic importance of the partnership between the United States and Europe. This comes at a critical time when international collaborations face various geopolitical pressures.
